title: BRIEF-Mineral Resources Says Iron Ore Shipments Totalled 3.5 Mln Wet Metric Tonnes In Q1
text:
BRIEF-Mineral Resources Says Iron Ore Shipments Totalled 3.5 Mln Wet Metric Tonnes In Q1

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 26, 2019 20:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mineral Resources Says Iron Ore Shipments Totalled 3.5 Mln Wet Metric Tonnes In Q1 Oct 24 (Reuters) - Mineral Resources Ltd : * IRON ORE SHIPMENTS TOTALLED 3.5 MILLION WET METRIC TONNES IN Q1 FY20, UP 114% ON PRIOR CORRESPONDING PERIOD * Q1FY20 TOTAL IRON ORE PRODUCED 3.1 MILLION WMT VERSUS 2 MILLION MWT IN Q1FY19 * Q1 FY20 TOTAL SPODUMENE PRODUCED 138,000 WMT VERSUS 111,000 WMT * CONSTRUCTION OF WODGINA LITHIUM PROJECT'S 3-STAGE 750,000 DRY TONNE PER ANNUM SPODUMENE CONCENTRATE PLANT IS OVER 99% COMPLETE

BRIEF-Mineral Resources Says Iron Ore Shipments Totalled 3.5 Mln Wet Metric Tonnes In Q1
description: BRIEF-Mineral Resources Says Iron Ore Shipments Totalled 3.5 Mln Wet Metric Tonnes In Q1
